attributes.action: make Mike Walthew Lord of Escalation in Telecoms Industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Neil Smith and Russ Tarrant agree that Mike Walthew of Epsom Downs should be Lord of Escalations. Also I think Gordon is doing a good job in difficult circumstances.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
